name: NXT Corp
description:
NXT Corp is a monster taming RPG made in 48 hours for GMTK 2021 game jam. The theme was Joined Together. NXT Corp features 15 base monsters and 25 fusions. 

Fuse two monsters together and test their strength to find the best combinations. Capture new monsters along the way using monster rope.

Battle strategically using short range attacks to defeat long range, medium range to defeat short range and long range to defeat medium range. AI will never use the same attack twice in a row.

As you capture new monsters experiment to discover the best fusions and help NXT Corp to conquer the world.
